page.title: 06Education in The Shelsleys.B
page.content: Free bus transport is also provided to the local Comprehensive School,{The {Chantry High School}at Martley, 5 miles away, which has 600 pupils of 11-16, a fine spacious modern campus and 33 teachers. All local children except those at{independent schools transfer to it at 11. From here those who wish to pursue further education are accepted at the{Sixth Form College in Worcester, where an excellent range of courses is offered for Advanced Level, and also at{Worcester Technical {College}, which can offer hairdressing secretarial, City and Guilds Cookery as well as G.C.E. and many vocational courses and TOPS for the young adult. A good range of day and evening classes is offered in Worcester as well as tuition in basic literacy but transport thereto is difficult.
